div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 743 Vinogradec, c. 25 km. W of Pa- zardzik, Bulgaria, 1963 Burial: c. 330-320 B.C. (T) Contents: c. 400 AR. Pot hoard Thasos: st. Thracian Chersonese: hemidr. Parium: hemidr. Disposition: Pazardzik 1 Thasos, 130 Chers., 9 Parium Gerasimov, BIAB 27 (1964), p. 241
